tasks.label: Dev: next dev with auto open
args: $env:NODE_ENV='development'; $proc = Start-Process -FilePath 'cmd.exe' -ArgumentList '/c','npm run dev' -PassThru; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Start-Process 'http://localhost:3000'; Wait-Process -Id $proc.Id

args: $env:NODE_ENV='development'; $proc = Start-Process -FilePath 'cmd.exe' -ArgumentList '/c','"npm run dev"' -PassThru; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Start-Process 'http://localhost:3000'; Wait-Process -Id $proc.Id
